title: Psychological treatment of generalized anxiety disorder: A meta-analysis
draft_paragraph: 선행연구 결과를 종합하면 해당 변인은 정신건강 결과에 의미 있는 설명력을 가진다. 특히 Cuijpers (2014)의 결과는 해당 메커니즘이 정신건강 지표와 연결될 수 있음을 보여준다 [@cuijpersPsychologicalTreatmentGeneralized2014].
apa_reference: Cuijpers, P., Sijbrandij, M., Koole, S., Huibers, M., Berking, M., & Andersson, G. (2014). Psychological treatment of generalized anxiety disorder: A meta-analysis. Clinical Psychology Review. https://doi.org/10.1016/j.cpr.2014.01.002
evidence_snippet_1: The effects on depression were also large (g=0.71; 95% CI: 0.59–0.82).
evidence_snippet_2: A total of 41 studies (with 2132 patients meeting diagnostic criteria for GAD) were identified through systematic searches in bibliographical databases, and were included in the meta-analysis.
source_card: 02_cards_quick/Psychological treatment of generalized anxiety disorder A meta-analysis.md
